HOME.TITLE: Welcome to Our Parish
HOME.SUBTITLE: You are the temple of God, the house that He builds.
HOME.MISSION_DESC: To proclaim the Gospel of Jesus Christ and serve our community with faith, hope, and love.
HOME.MASS_TIMES_DESC: Join us for daily and Sunday celebrations of the Holy Eucharist.
HOME.COMMUNITY_DESC: A welcoming parish family committed to worship, service, and fellowship.
HOME.SACRAMENTS_DESC: Celebrating the sacramental life and milestones of our faith community.

PARISH.TITLE: Our Parish
PARISH.ABOUT_DESC: We are a vibrant Catholic community dedicated to worshiping God and serving our neighbors. Our parish is guided by the teachings of the Catholic Church and inspired by the Gospel of Jesus Christ.
PARISH.HISTORY_DESC: Our parish has a rich history of faith and service in our community. Founded many years ago, we continue to grow in our commitment to Christ and His Church.
PARISH.PASTOR_DESC: Father John Smith has been serving our parish community with dedication and pastoral care.

MASSES.TITLE: Mass Schedule
MASSES.HOLY_DAYS_DESC: Please check the bulletin for special Mass times on Holy Days.
MASSES.VIRTUAL_DESC: Join us online for livestreamed celebrations.
MASSES.INTENTIONS_DESC: Request a Mass to be offered for your intentions.

EVENTS.TITLE: Parish Events
EVENTS.CALENDAR_DESC: Stay connected with our parish community through various events and activities throughout the year.

NEWS.TITLE: Parish News
NEWS.BULLETIN_DESC: Read our latest parish bulletin for announcements, upcoming events, and spiritual reflections.

COMMITTEES.TITLE: Parish Committees
COMMITTEES.DESCRIPTION: Our parish committees help organize and support various aspects of parish life. Get involved and share your talents!
COMMITTEES.LITURGY_DESC: Plans and coordinates liturgical celebrations and enhances our worship experience.
COMMITTEES.FINANCE_DESC: Provides oversight and guidance for the parish's financial stewardship.
COMMITTEES.PASTORAL_DESC: Advises the pastor on pastoral matters and parish planning.

VOLUNTEERING.TITLE: Volunteer Opportunities
VOLUNTEERING.DESCRIPTION: There are many ways to serve in our parish community. Your time and talents are gifts that help build the Kingdom of God.
VOLUNTEERING.LECTORS_DESC: Proclaim the Word of God during Mass.
VOLUNTEERING.EUCHARISTIC_DESC: Assist in the distribution of Holy Communion.
VOLUNTEERING.USHERS_DESC: Welcome parishioners and assist during Mass.
VOLUNTEERING.CHOIR_DESC: Share your musical talents in liturgical celebrations.

CAMPAIGNS.TITLE: Parish Campaigns
CAMPAIGNS.DESCRIPTION: Support our parish initiatives and special campaigns that help us serve our community and maintain our facilities.
CAMPAIGNS.CAPITAL_DESC: Help us with building improvements and renovations.
CAMPAIGNS.ANNUAL_DESC: Your annual gift supports our parish ministries and outreach programs.

DONATION.TITLE: Make a Donation
DONATION.DESCRIPTION: Your generous support helps our parish continue its mission of worship, service, and evangelization.
DONATION.ONLINE_DESC: Make a secure online donation through our giving platform.
DONATION.MAIL_DESC: Send your donation to our parish office.
DONATION.PERSON_DESC: Drop off your donation at the parish office or place it in the collection basket at Mass.
